alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 1:31PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Gusts between 110 and 130 mph are possible along exposed ridges. Waves 4 to 6 feet on Lake Tahoe. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...From 10 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Boating conditions will be extremely dangerous on Lake Tahoe as small vessels could easily capsize.
info.instruction: Now is the time Secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage. Move boating or other outdoor recreation plans to a different day with calmer weather.
